inclusion.criterion: Adult man or woman (over 18 years) and naïve, unoperated pituitary tumour with growth hormone
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Naïve, unoperated pituitary tumour with GH or ACTH or TSH production or NFPA without treatment with somatostatin analogues or dopamine agonists.
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man with Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has an IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age, and his random GH level is 4 ug/L.
